items.content_html: A lightweight and easy to use micro ORM for Node/TypeScript.

items.content_html: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.
items.title: AnkanSaha/AxioDB: A fast, lightweight, and scalable open-source DBMS for modern apps. Supports JSON-based data storage, simple APIs, and secure data management. Ideal for projects needing efficient and flexible database solutions.

items.content_html: Swarm.js is a Node.js implementation of OpenAI’s experimental Swarm framework. This SDK allows developers to orchestrate multi-agent systems using OpenAI’s API in a lightweight and ergonomic way, while leveraging Node.js for building scalable, real-world applications.
items.title: youseai/openai-swarm-node: Swarm.js is a Node.js implementation of OpenAI’s experimental Swarm framework. This SDK allows developers to orchestrate multi-agent systems using OpenAI’s API in a lightweight and ergonomic way, while leveraging Node.js for building scalable, real-world applications.

items.content_html: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.
items.title: Heiko-Lemmert/join-project: Join is a lightweight and flexible Kanban board application designed to help teams and individuals manage tasks and projects efficiently. Inspired by Trello, Join enables you to create boards, lists, and cards to organize your workflow seamlessly.

items.content_html: A lightweight web wallet for Cardano cryptocurrency with Trezor, Ledger and BitBox02 support. Please note that the only valid domain for our wallet is adalite.io
